definitions.title: n.pr.mont.
definitions.body: Saneir: Amorite name of Ḥermon De 3:9, whence came cypress-trees Ez Eze 27:5, prob. northern peak(s) of Ḥ. 1Ch 5:23, Ct So 4:8 (where + [[חֶרְמוֹן]]); so Ar. snyr Abulf:ed. Par. 68, Syr. sniyr, Sir 24:13 al., As. Saniru COT:De 3:9 D1:Pa 104. Vid. also Dr:De 3:9 Buhl:Geogr. 110 f. and reff. [van d. H. erron. ´[[שׁ]]: Dt Ct].
